properties.description:
Peninsula Heights is one of London’s most exclusive riverside developments offering breathtaking views over the city. This spacious five-bedroom apartment occupies the entire 6th floor, and benefits from an expansive reception room ideal for entertaining. 
 Further benefits include a master ensuite bedroom with dressing room, and river-facing balcony, four further bedrooms, two of which are ensuite, a guest bathroom, and an abundance of storage throughout.

properties.address: Admirals Court, 30 Horselydown Lane, London SE1
properties.description:
A three bedroom triplex penthouse apartment located in the heart of Shad Thames, close to the river front. 
 The property comprises a bright kitchen/ living room that leads directly onto a private terrace. In addition, the apartment includes three bedrooms, two bathrooms and reception room. It benefits from a large amount of light and boasts generous sized terraces. 
 Admirals Court is set in the Tower Bridge Piazza, making it very accessible to the large variety of bars.

properties.address: St Georges Road, Kennington, London SE1
properties.description: Beautifully presented throughout, this four bedroom Grade II listed Georgian house only a short distance from the Imperial War Museum offers over 1768 sq ft of living space. With a front and rear garden plus a garage a viewing is highly recommended.

A pretty, well presented house with off street parking and a stunning garden set in the heart of Bermondsey. 
 The ground floor comprises a bright open plan kitchen with island and reception room, leading out of glass doors to a generous garden. Upstairs is a well proprtioned bedroom next to a smart bathroom and a hatch leads to a loft space for storage.
